설명: Use i18nexus lazy loading feature to dynamically load translation files only when needed.
개요 설명: Lazy loading helps reduce initial bundle size and improve performance. Instead of loading all translations at once, it dynamically loads only the needed namespaces.
설정 단계1 설명: Set the lazy option to true:
설정 단계2 설명: Running the extractor automatically generates index.ts for lazy loading:
생성된 구조 설명: The extractor generates a type-safe lazy loading structure like this:
사용 예제 설명: Simply use the generated i18n object as is:
프리로드 설명: You can preload namespaces needed for specific pages:
주의사항2: In server components, required namespaces are automatically loaded
주의사항3: In client components, namespaces are automatically loaded on first use
eager loading 설명: If you want to load all translations at once, set the lazy option to false or remove it:
